column5: the explosion of a landmine accident caused a man to die at Oth Than in Oak Meas village
column9: identified as a 37 year old male
column10: lived in the village. ------The victim was cutting bamboo near a stream. Officers arrived
column11: examined the scene and handed over the body to the family for the traditional festivals.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/286718
